TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BluetoothAdapter extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the local device Bluetooth adapter.
Intent used to broadcast the change in connection state of the local Bluetooth adapter to a profile of the remote device.
Broadcast Action: The local Bluetooth adapter has finished the device discovery process.
Broadcast Action: The local Bluetooth adapter has started the remote device discovery process.
Broadcast Action: The local Bluetooth adapter has changed its friendly Bluetooth name.
Activity Action: Show a system activity that requests discoverable mode.
Activity Action: Show a system activity that allows the user to turn on Bluetooth.
Broadcast Action: Indicates the Bluetooth scan mode of the local Adapter has changed.
Broadcast Action: The state of the local Bluetooth adapter has been changed.
Returns the hardware address of the local Bluetooth adapter.
Returns a object for Bluetooth LE Advertising operations.
Returns a object for Bluetooth LE scan operations.
Return the set of objects that are bonded (paired) to the local adapter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool CancelDiscovery() cil managed

Docs.summary: Cancel the current device discovery process.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool CheckBluetoothAddress(string address) cil managed

Docs.summary: Validate a String Bluetooth address, such as "00:43:A8:23:10:F0"

MemberSignature.Value: public void CloseProfileProxy (Android.Bluetooth.ProfileType profile, Android.Bluetooth.IBluetoothProfile proxy);
.method public hidebysig instance void CloseProfileProxy(valuetype Android.Bluetooth.ProfileType profile, class Android.Bluetooth.IBluetoothProfile proxy) cil managed

Docs.summary: Close the connection of the profile proxy to the Service.
Get a handle to the default local Bluetooth adapter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Disable() cil managed

Docs.summary: Turn off the local Bluetooth adapter—do not use without explicit user action to turn off Bluetooth.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Enable() cil managed

Docs.summary: Turn on the local Bluetooth adapter—do not use without explicit user action to turn on Bluetooth.
Sentinel error value for this class.

Extra used by
This extra represents the current connection state.
Used as an optional int extra field in intents to request a specific duration for discoverability in seconds.
Used as a String extra field in intents to request the local Bluetooth name.

Extra used by
This extra represents the previous connection state.
Used as an int extra field in intents to request the previous scan mode.
Used as an int extra field in intents to request the previous power state.
Used as an int extra field in intents to request the current scan mode.
Used as an int extra field in intents to request the current power state.

Docs.summary: Get the profile proxy object associated with the profile.

Return true if offloaded scan batching is supported
